Package com.example.butter

Class QRCodeDB

java.lang.Object
com.example.butter.QRCodeDB
public class QRCodeDB extends Object
This class can be used to interact with the "QRCode" collection of our Firebase database It implements methods to easily add and remove QR codes in this collection

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, String eventID)
      Turns a QR Code bitmap to a string, and stores it into firebase
      Parameters:
      bitmap - bitmap to be converted and stored as a string
      eventID - eventID of the event this QR code is associated with

    • delete

      public void delete(String eventID)
      Deletes the QR Code associated with a eventID
      Parameters:
      eventID - eventID of the event whose QR code should be deleted
